recovery_key.keep_content:
Be sure to keep the recovery key in a safe place where only you can see it.
Recovery keys are the only way to recover your wallet in case you lose your password.
If it exposed to other people, they will also have access to your wallet.
It is recommended to store it physically, such as on paper.
recovery_key.lost_content:
ELYSIA is a decentralized application and will never store your passwords, recovery keys, etc. in our database.
If you lose both your password or recovery key, your wallet CANNOT be recovered.
recovery_key.checkbox: I confirm that I fully understand the above and agree to create a wallet.
recovery_key.backup_seed:
This is your recovery key.
Make sure you save it for future reference
recovery_key.backup_seed_notice: Please write your recovery key below on a piece of paper and keep it in a safe place. Confirm your seed phrase on the next step.
recovery_key.backup_seed_checkbox: I have kept the above seed phrase and confirm that I agree to proceed to the next step.
recovery_key.check_seed_notice: This is the step to check the seed phrases you have stored. Please enter it correctly.
recovery_key.wallet_select: Do you have any existing wallets?
recovery_key.wallet_select_content: You can create a new wallet or use an existing wallet.

wallet.recover_infomation:
Before resetting your password, please check the following.

・We currently keep a separate recovery key for this wallet.
・If the recovery key is lost or reset, no one can recover the wallet.
wallet.recover_check:
I fully understand and agree with the above,
and I will proceed with the password reset.
wallet.withdrawal_content: Enter the wallet address to withdraw.
